new_features.desktop_pets: Advanced AI behavior system with autonomous pet actions

data.name: Advanced Desktop Pets
data.description: AI-powered virtual pets with autonomous behavior and personality

gameplay.interaction: Click pets to interact, drag to move them around
gameplay.ai_behavior: Pets have autonomous AI that makes decisions based on their needs
gameplay.feeding: Spawn food and watch pets automatically seek and consume it
gameplay.states: Pets transition between idle, walking, running, sleeping, eating, and playing

ai_features: Dynamic state transitions based on internal timers
controls: ➕ Add Pet - Spawn new pets of selected type
🗑️ Clear All - Remove all pets from desktop
🍖 Feed All - Instantly feed all pets
🎾 Play Time - Make all pets happy and playful
😴 Sleep Mode - Make all pets go to sleep
🍎 Spawn Food - Add food items for pets to find
technical_features: Dynamic DOM manipulation for pet elements
Custom cursor effects and visual polish
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

data.name: Cosmic Sheep
data.description: Interactive virtual sheep that eats cosmic icons

gameplay.evolution: Sheep evolves as it levels up

controls: 🍎 Spawn Food - Manually spawn food icons
❤️ Pet Sheep - Increase happiness and energy
🔄 Reset - Reset sheep to starting state
🤖 Auto Mode - Toggle automatic food spawning

quick_tips.description: Be among the first 10 applicants to significantly increase your chances
Use keywords like 'hospitality', 'customer relations', and 'virtual support'
Practice with video calling tools and ensure good lighting and audio
Mention familiarity with POS systems, order management software, and CRM tools
Leverage AI application tools like AI Apply to automate applications
Connect with restaurant managers and hospitality recruiters
